issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Handle exception related changes in YARN's AMRMProtocol api after YARN-630

comments.body: Reviewed and committed this together with YARN-630 to trunk and branch-2. Thanks Xuan!

Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #3724 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/3724/])
    YARN-630. Changed AMRMProtocol api to throw IOException and YarnRemoteException. Contributed by Xuan Gong.
MAPREDUCE-5226. Handling YarnRemoteException separately from IOException in MR App's use of AMRMProtocol after YARN-630. Contributed by Xuan Gong. (Revision 1480529)

     Result = SUCCESS
vinodkv : http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/?root=Apache-SVN&view=rev&rev=1480529
